scripts.test:e2e: RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:drop && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:create && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:migrate && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:seed && playwright test && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:drop && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:create && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:migrate
scripts.test:e2e:ui: RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:drop && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:create && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:migrate && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:seed && playwright test --ui && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:drop && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:create && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:migrate
scripts.test:e2e:headed: RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:drop && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:create && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:migrate && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:seed && playwright test --headed && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:drop && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:create && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:migrate
scripts.test:e2e:debug: RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:drop && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:create && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:migrate && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:seed && playwright test --debug && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:drop && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:create && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:migrate
scripts.test:all: npm test -- --run && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:drop && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:create && RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:migrate && bundle exec rspec && npm run test:e2e
